english.segment1: More love to Thee, O Christ, more love to Thee!. Hear Thou the prayer I make on bended knee.
english.segment2: This is my earnest plea: More love, O Christ, to Thee;. More love to Thee, more love to Thee!. Once earthly joy I craved, sought peace and rest;. Now Thee alone I seek, give what is best.
english.segment3: This all my prayer shall be: More love, O Christ to Thee;. More love to Thee, more love to Thee!. Then shall my latest breath whisper Thy praise;. This be the parting cry my heart shall raise;. Still all my prayer shall be: More love, O Christ to Thee;
english.segment4: More love to Thee, more love to Thee!. More love to Thee, more love to Thee!
